lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury again practiced with the team, but did not talk with reporters. The Knicks said he would not speak publicly until after he plays his next game. He has had three stints of bereavement leave. ... Jamal Crawford practiced but was limited to shooting and drills as he wore a protective glove. He is questionable for Wednesday.
